name: Chaos on Wheels
description:
Chaos on Wheels: Ultimate & Chaotic vehicular combat experience. Customize your cars, equip armor, buy weapons, unlock new gadgets, upgrade ammo, and fight other cars in a battle of total mayhem. Choose your driver and take a wheel of a heavily armored car. Drive yourself to victory by destroying any enemy that stands in your way. Avoid projectiles, traps, and hazards and bring chaos to anyone who opposes you.
Complete achievements, upgrade cars and make even more chaos.

Key Features:


Fast-paced action with tons of bullets, rockets, and missiles. Play with your friends, find new friends and enemies, destroy them all, and leave nothing but chaos.



Manage your special garage where you can upgrade weapons, ammo, and armor. Equip new gadgets, add wraps, throw in some colors, and make your dream ride. Fill in all 5 slots with your deadly custom machines.



Pick your driver, buckle up, and unleash the power of your high-performance machine. Drive, drift, jump, and perform stunts to your heart's content.



Don't forget about Turrets and Hazards. They are there to stop you! Destroy them first and unlock new cars, weapons, armor, or gadgets and leave Helios and his turret army in ashes.
